meanings.sent1: The old abandoned house was insanitary, with mold growing everywhere.
meanings.sent2: The insanitary conditions of the public restroom were a cause for concern.
meanings.sent3: The insanitary kitchen made the health inspector cringe.
meanings.sent4: The insanitary environment of the swamp was a breeding ground for bacteria.
meanings.sent5: The insanitary hospital room posed a risk to patients' well-being.

meanings.definition: Not conducive to good health or cleanliness
meanings.sent1: Living in insanitary conditions can lead to various illnesses.
meanings.sent2: The insanitary water source was a major health hazard for the community.
meanings.sent3: The insanitary habits of the roommate were a constant source of frustration.
meanings.sent4: The insanitary practices in the food industry can have serious consequences.
meanings.sent5: The insanitary air quality in the city was affecting residents' health.
